title: U.S. online shopping frequency 2014 to 2017
summary: This statistic presents the reasons why users in the united use online dating sites or apps . During the 2017 survey , 61 percent of responding current or former dating website or app users said they used dating websites and apps to meet people who share their interests or hobbies .
gold: This statistic presents the online shopping frequency of internet users in the United States as of March 2017 . During the most recent survey period , 29 percent of respondents stated they purchased goods online at least once a week .
